Stage.Text: Hi, I've lost my wallet, I don’t suppose you've seen it anywhere.
I'm sure I had it when I came into the shop.
It's a brown leather wallet. I really need it to pay for my shopping.
Oh, you found it! Thank you so much, I don’t know what I would have done if you didn't.
You haven't? If you do see it, please come find me right away.
You saw someone pick it up over by the freezer? What did he look like?
If you found it, why didn't you let me know when I asked? Have you taken anything from it?
In future, don’t take what isn't yours!
You lied! That man said he didn't find my wallet. Have you stolen it?
If you find something and don’t hand it in, it's the same as stealing.
I want you to give me my wallet back now.
Someone help, this thief has stolen my wallet!
